p: After incubation for 30 min at 37 °C, 50 μl aliquot of substrate solution was added to each well and the plate was incubated at room temperature for 30 min. 150 μl aliquots of stop-solution buffer were added to the wells when incubation was complete, and optical density was measured by the “Tecan” spectrophotometer, using the fluorescent protocol [ 19, 20].
